content: In his carp form, he'll swim about for a moment to try ramming you, and will then back off before swimming forward to dive at you, going under the mud as he does. It'll be hard to anticipate when he surfaces, so be ready to evade at a moment's notice.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
In his carp form, he'll swim about for a moment to try ramming you, and will then back off before swimming forward to dive at you, going under the mud as he does. It'll be hard to anticipate when he surfaces, so be ready to evade at a moment's notice.
